Frequently Asked Questions

Find quick answers to the most common questions about Leadaisy's features, setup, and best practices.

Getting Started

How quickly can I get my AI assistant up and running?

Most customers are live within 24 hours. Our team handles the complete setup process including AI training, customization, and integration with your website.

Do I need technical knowledge to use Leadaisy?

Not at all! We provide white-glove implementation and handle all technical aspects. You simply provide us with information about your business, and we take care of the rest.

What information do you need to set up my AI assistant?

We'll need basic business information (services, pricing, FAQs), your website details, and any specific conversation flows you'd like. Our team guides you through this process.

Can I try Leadaisy before committing?

Yes! We offer a 30-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required to start, and you can cancel anytime during the trial period.

Setup & Configuration

How do I customize my AI assistant's responses?

Our team trains your AI using your business knowledge base, FAQs, and specific requirements. You can request updates anytime, and we'll refine the responses to match your brand voice.

Can I integrate Leadaisy with my existing CRM?

Yes! We support 50+ CRM integrations including Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive, and Zoho. Leads are automatically synced with custom field mapping.

How do I add the chatbot to my website?

We provide a simple code snippet that you (or your web developer) can add to your website. It works with all major platforms including WordPress, Shopify, Squarespace, and custom sites.

Can I customize the appearance of the chat widget?

Absolutely! We customize colors, fonts, positioning, and branding to match your website perfectly. Enterprise customers can even white-label the entire experience.

Lead Capture & Conversations

How does the AI know when to capture lead information?

Our AI is trained to detect purchase intent and naturally guide conversations toward lead capture. It identifies high-value prospects and seamlessly collects contact information.

What happens when a lead is captured?

You receive instant notifications via email, SMS, or your preferred channel. The lead is automatically added to your CRM with full conversation context and contact details.

Can customers reach a human if needed?

Yes! Your AI assistant can seamlessly transfer conversations to your team when requested, or automatically escalate complex issues that require human expertise.

Does the AI work in multiple languages?

Yes, our AI supports 95+ languages and can automatically detect and respond in the customer's preferred language, making it perfect for global businesses.

Team & Collaboration

Can multiple team members access the Leadaisy dashboard?

Yes! You can add unlimited team members with different permission levels. Managers get full access while agents can view conversations and manage specific aspects.

How do I train my team to work with the AI assistant?

We provide comprehensive training materials and onboarding sessions. Your team learns how to review conversations, take over chats, and optimize the AI's performance.

Can I see all conversations and analytics?

Absolutely! Your dashboard shows all conversations, lead capture rates, customer satisfaction scores, and detailed analytics to help you optimize performance.

What kind of support do you provide?

All customers get 24/7 email support. Enterprise customers receive priority phone support and dedicated account management for ongoing optimization.

Security & Compliance

Is my customer data secure with Leadaisy?

Yes! We're SOC 2 Type II certified with bank-level security. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest, with strict access controls and regular security audits.

Are you GDPR and CCPA compliant?

Absolutely. We're fully compliant with GDPR, CCPA, and other privacy regulations. We provide data processing agreements and help you maintain compliance.

Where is my data stored?

Data is stored in secure, SOC 2 certified data centers with redundancy and backup systems. We can accommodate specific data residency requirements for enterprise customers.

Can I export or delete my data?

Yes! You have full control over your data. You can export conversation history, lead data, and analytics at any time, or request complete data deletion.
